Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Delano
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark & Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Delano.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Delano.

Allow extra travel time.
